decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Spine Lighting Dot Specifications, Podium Downlights Specifications Received: 06 August 2013 
Lighting Controller Specifications, A1944 Z 1110 Rev. P3, A1943 A6903 Rev. P2, A1943 A6904 Rev. P2, 111 Rev. C, 110 Received: 09 August 2013; Unnumbered CGI Received: 13 August 2013 ; Lighting Impact Assessment Rev. 01 Received: 29 January 2014 
Letter from Planning Perspectives dated 04 April 2014 Received: 04 April 2014 ) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The lighting elements to the building facade hereby granted shall be static and only permitted between dusk and midnight, with the facade lighting to be automatically switched off at midnight.
Condition : 4 - The maximum luminance for the lighting elements hereby granted shall not exceed 600 cd/sqm during the day and 300 cd/sqm from dusk till dawn.
description: Installation of lighting elements to the tower
